system.prerequisites:
Shielded by the Warp
OW: Psy Rating 6
system.sustained: The Psyker bolsters themselves with the Warp. On Successful Focus Power Test, they gain 1d10 + 1d10 per Degree of Success to their Strength and Toughness Characteristics for as long as power is sustained. However each round they sustain the power for, they gain 1 Corruption Point.
